full_output.summary: Highly motivated Artificial Intelligence & Data Science engineer with a passion for building data-driven applications. Proficient in full-stack development and equipped with a strong foundation in data analytics and machine learning gained through coursework and personal projects. Experienced Linux user with intermediate proficiency in Git Bash, Shell Scripting, and Automation. My GitHub profile showcases my technical abilities and projects demonstrating expertise in programming and data wrangling. Eager to apply my data analysis skills in SQL, Python, and data visualization to contribute to data-driven decision-making in a dynamic environment.

certifications.description: An in-depth course on Data analysis provided by Coursera, focusing on complex problem solving and data wrangling with data ethics as core.

projects.name: BELLABEAT CASE STUDY
projects.description: Analysis of FitBit Fitness Tracker Data. The study focused on identifying growth opportunities for Bellabeat, a wellness tech company that creates smart products for women, as part of Machine Learningthe Google Data Analytics Professional Certificate capstone course.

projects.name: BERT-TEXT-CLASSIFICATION
projects.description: Fine-tune a pretrained bert model The bert model uses tf.data api as input data pipeline and perform classification of the desired cases.

experiences.description: Internship focusing on data analysis and visualization. Analyzed large datasets using SQL and Python, identifying key trends and patterns, which improved data-driven decision-making by 20%. Utilized SPSS extensively for statistical analysis and generated diagrams using Jamovi. Developed and presented data visualizations using Tableau, resulting in enhanced stakeholder understanding of complex data sets. Collaborated on a project focused on implementing deep learning papers, where I played a key role in the implementation using Python.
